question: How can I donate to Naaz Commercial Institute?
answer: You can donate through our secure online donation portal using credit card, debit card, or net banking. Alternatively, you can send cheques/demand drafts to our registered address in Makhdumpur, Jehanabad, Bihar. We do not accept cash donations to maintain transparency.

question: Are donations to Naaz Commercial Institute tax-exempt?
answer: Yes, All donations made to Naaz Commercial Institute are 50% tax exempted under the section 80G of the Income Tax Act 1961.

question: How will my donation be used?
answer: Your donations directly support our educational programs including commercial training courses, computer labs, learning materials, and scholarships for underprivileged students. We also use funds for community welfare initiatives like dry ration distribution and skill development programs.

question: Can I volunteer at Naaz Commercial Institute?
answer: Yes! We welcome volunteers who can contribute their time and expertise. Whether you can teach computer skills, provide career guidance, or help with administrative tasks, your support is valuable. Please contact us at nksjahanabad@gmail.com to discuss volunteer opportunities.

question: How do I stay updated about your activities?
answer: You can follow us on our social media channels (Facebook, Instagram) or subscribe to our newsletter by contacting us at nksjahanabad@gmail.com. We regularly share updates about our programs, events, and impact stories.

question: Can corporates partner with Naaz Commercial Institute?
answer: We welcome corporate partnerships for CSR initiatives, equipment donations, sponsorship of courses, or employee volunteer programs. Corporate support helps us scale our impact and reach more students. Please reach out to discuss partnership opportunities.

question: How can I share my success story?
answer: We love hearing from our students and community members! You can share your story by emailing nksjahanabad@gmail.com or filling out the form on our Stories page. Your experiences inspire others and help us showcase the real impact of our work.

question: Where is Naaz Commercial Institute located?
answer: We are located in Makhdumpur, Jehanabad district, Bihar 804422, India. You can visit us during our operating hours or contact us at +91 90973 51490 for directions and appointment.
